author: adityapatwardhan
body:
`Enter-PSSession` does not work when trying to connect to the 6.2.0-preview.1 endpoint on a Windows IOT ARM32 on Raspberry Pi. 

`Invoke-Command` with the same session works though.

Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell
PS> $s = New-PSSession -computername x.x.x.x -credential Administrator -ConfigurationName PowerShell.6.2.0-preview.1
PS> Enter-PSSession $s
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

```none
Can connect interactively.
```

Actual behavior
---------------

```none
PS> Enter-PSSession $s
Enter-PSSession : The term 'Measure-Object' is not recognized as the name of a cmdlet, function, script file, or
operable program.
Check the spelling of the name, or if a path was included, verify that the path is correct and try again.
At line:1 char:1
+ Enter-PSSession $s
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : ObjectNotFound: (Measure-Object:String) [Enter-PSSession], CommandNotFoundException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : CommandNotFoundException

```

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
> $PSVersionTable
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
Platform                       Win32NT
PSVersion                      6.2.0-preview.1
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.17134
PSEdition                      Core
WSManStackVersion              3.0
GitCommitId                    6.2.0-preview.1
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1

```

comments.author: MedBouc
comments.body:
same issue here. 
Works perfectly fine with windows Powershell 5.1 but not with any Powershell 6.x

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body:
@MedBouchenafa It seems to be working fine for preview.3. Can you give it a try?

```PowerShell
$s2 = New-PSSession -computername 10.31.62.246 -credential Administrator -ConfigurationName PowerShell.6.2.0-preview.3

PS> $s2 | fl *


State                  : Opened
IdleTimeout            : 7200000
OutputBufferingMode    : Block
DisconnectedOn         :
ExpiresOn              :
ComputerType           : RemoteMachine
ComputerName           : 10.31.62.246
ContainerId            :
VMName                 :
VMId                   :
ConfigurationName      : PowerShell.6.2.0-preview.3
InstanceId             : 3eb499d9-fda3-403d-8c2c-e5d0ebaaeab3
Id                     : 1
Name                   : WinRM1
Availability           : Available
ApplicationPrivateData : {DebugMode, DebugStop, UnhandledBreakpointMode, PSVersionTable...}
Runspace               : System.Management.Automation.RemoteRunspace

PS> icm $s2 { get-ciminstance Win32_ComputerSystem } | Select-Object -Property Name,Model,Manufacturer,PSComputername

Name     Model          Manufacturer PSComputerName
----     -----          ------------ --------------
MINWINPC Raspberry Pi 3 Raspberry Pi 10.31.62.246

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as answered and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Enter-PSSession does not work connected to 6.2.0-preview.1 endpoint on Windows ARM32
